categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back actors

nodes.text: Milton Johns (born May 13, 1938) is a British actor who portrayed Bewil, an Imperial officer, in The Empire Strikes Back.
He is best known to sci-fi fans for appearing in Doctor Who in the stories The Enemy of the World (1967-68), The Android Invasion (1975) and The Invasion of Time (1978).
